name: TinyZx
description:
draw a tiny map with limited tiles! 

BUTTONS

LEFT MOUSE - draw

RIGHT MOUSE - erase

SPACE - set character position

WASD - move char

H - hide/show menu items

TEST MAP 'HI' (paste this into the games text box and hit LOAD)
